thread.title: Donna Pelletier
thread.title_full: Hudson Reed USA reviewed by Donna Pelletier

author: Donna Pelletier
title: Donna Pelletier
text: I contacted Hudson Reed both by email and phone. I received quick and helpful replies from both. The customer service rep was very polite and knowledgeable. I was also Quote: d a 5-7 day lead time for delivery and received my item in 3 days! BRAVO!!!! Thank you for excellent service.
